criteria: Understanding of Apparent Brightness vs. Distance: Demonstrates comprehension of how the distance between stars and Earth affects their apparent brightness.
Argumentation with Evidence: Supports claims with relevant evidence to argue that differences in apparent brightness are due to relative distances.
Use of Scientific Vocabulary: Accurately uses scientific terms related to stars, brightness, and distance.
